channel.title: [Open-Positions] New Project
channel.description:
Hello and good day,
My name is Thilo Sommer im 16 yrs. old and I live in Europe. I am posting this to recruit a team of Developers, Modelers and graphic designers. The plan for this project is to make a server which will set a new standard for RSPS's. You may ask why, well the simple answer is, that the good servers have died out and have been replaced by servers which only focus on gaining money through donations. Now I understand that many of these private servers are not run profesionaly and as such have to rely on donations, but this should not be the interest of the developers.
To make sure that this does not happen to this server I will be hosting it on a Dedicated VPS and will pay the developers. The later through donations, once they bring in more than the VPS costs.
Now to the details:
The Server will be of the distribution 317 (Hyperion, PI, Delta) and only have few customs.
[ul][li]All the usual PKing equipment will be included (GSs, Claws, Ancients, etc.)[/li] [li]All the usual Minigames ( Duel Arena, Castle Wars, Fire Caves, etc.)[/li] [li]All the usual PKing spots ( Hills, Edge, Varrock, Green Drags, Portals, Deep Wild)[/li] [li]All the Bosses ( GWD, KBD, Dag Kings) + Custom ( Will be discussed once a DevTeam is put together)[/li] [li]All the training spots ( Rock Crabs, Caged Ogres, etc.) + Custom ( Will be discussed once a DevTeam is put together)[/li] [li]Shopping Area[/li] [li]Player-Trading Area[/li] [li]All Skills working (and these will make the player profit from them!)[/li] [li]Custom Maps[/li][/ul]
Positions open :
Server-sided Coder : 2/2 positions Taken Client-sided Coder : 2/2 positions OPEN Maper : 2/2 positions OPEN Modeler/Animator : 2/2 positions OPEN Web Designer 2/2 positions OPEN
Co-Owner is Ironiq. Contact him at Ironiq@hotmail.com
Format:
Name: Age: Wanted Position*: Years of Experience*: Further Information:
* = required Fields.
If you would like to be in charge of multiple positions, please use 2 forms.
Thank you for your interest!
~Mixxed
[size=7]My MSN is thilosommer@aol.de[/size]

item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Name: Nicholas, Armstrong AKA Tillly
Age: 14 (4 months till 15)
Wanted Position*: Server Sided Coder
Years of Experience*: 2
Further Information: I started learning to program with java back when I was 12 after I first discovered about Mopar. Back then I had very little experience and my releases were horribly shit. With all the flame and thanks Ivâ€™e been through it got me motivated to learn the language better. I started getting better and now I frequently help people in the help sections when I am online on mopar.
Msn: Nicky_snowboardingmaster@hotmail.com

Hello and good day,

My name is Thilo Sommer im 16 yrs. old and I live in Europe. I am posting this to recruit a team of Developers, Modelers and graphic designers.
The plan for this project is to make a server which will set a new standard for RSPSâ€™s. You may ask why, well the simple answer is, that the good servers have died out and have been replaced by servers which only focus on gaining money through donations.
